data.title: 13th BFDG Production Design Awards Brochure
data.meta_description: The BFDG is a flourishing professional organisation of Art Department Creatives and Production Designers spanning the various branches of the Art D...
data.text: The BFDG is a flourishing professional organisation of Art Department Creatives and Production Designers spanning the various branches of the Art Department in Film, Television and Commercials. Our membership comprises over 650 accredited members who are among the most talented in the industry. Our core principles are to raise the profile of the Art Department, promote and encourage excellence within it, protect the interests of our members, nurture new talent and showcase our membersâ€™ work. Our annual awards are to celebrate and congratulate our members and the wealth of talent within the British Art Department. In our brochure you will find information about the nominees, sponsors and the BFDG. To find out more about the BFDG and how to join, please go our website: britishfilmdesigners.com
